attributes.action: stop people making stupid petitions in there little fantasy worlds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: people are creating petitions that are so so silly for example an empty plinth in trafalgar square absolutely mad and obviously the person doing this is bloody stupid.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
